answers.answer: Oh love I promise its not from you eating those things....yes now you have to watch yourself but its just the way your body is reacting to the placenta...this is my second pregnancy and my second time having it...don't feel bad please you didn't give it to yourself
It just horrible that I found out so late in my pregnancy.
Well at least you know now and still have time to control it before your little one comes

I had it with my last pregnancy thank goodness I controlled it with the diet the Dr put me on I am now 16 weeks pregnant and I was just tested for.it . just do what the Dr tells you and you will be fine and so will your babu

question: I'm 34wks  pregnant and I just found out that I have gestational diabetes.  I feel horrible now that Ive been eating everything I craved. So now I have to watch wat I eat and drink I love sweets.
title: gestational diabetes.
